alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 31 at 3:14AM HST until August 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR MOLOKAI LANAI KAHOOLAWE MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... .Strong high pressure far northeast of the state will bring windy trade winds to the island chain today. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast to east winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Molokai and Maui. The strongest winds are expected over and downwind of the mountains and through valleys. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down tree branches, blow away tents and unsecured objects, and make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
